name: Beam Register
query:
SELECT
`tabWages Entry`.beam as "Beam ID:Link/Beam Detail Entry:150",
`tabWages Entry`.item as "Item:Link/Item:100",
`tabWages Entry`.machine as "Machine:Link/Machine:80",
`tabBeam Detail Entry`.warper as "Warper::100",
`tabWages Entry`.beam_no as "Beam No::50",
`tabBeam Detail Entry`.b_len as "Beam Length:Float:100",
sum(`tabWages Entry`.taka_mtr) as "Produced Mtr:Float:100",
count(`tabWages Entry`.taka_mtr) as "No of Taka:Data:100",
sum(`tabWages Entry`.short) as "Shortage:Float:100",
(`tabWages Entry`.b_len-sum(`tabWages Entry`.short+`tabWages Entry`.taka_mtr)) as "Bal Mtr:Float:100"
FROM `tabWages Entry`, `tabBeam Detail Entry`
WHERE `tabWages Entry`.beam = `tabBeam Detail Entry`.name
GROUP by Warper
